publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-992 Stewart Stevenson: Abolition of Bridge Tolls (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Abolition of Bridge Tolls (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: John Swinney*, Jim Mather*
